attributes.action: allow people to view any census files
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i damien abraham would like you of the UK to sign this patition to stop the government from holding information of our ancesters and let us be able to find out more about our families.

with enough people that sign this form we will be able to access any file on our ancesters and relatives

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
